{"id":475798961,"lang":"java","time":"6 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1617432728,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/475798961/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    int remove=0;\n    ArrayList<Character> cur_result=new ArrayList<Character>();\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n        for (char c : s.toCharArray()) {\n          cur_result.add(c);\n        }\n        do{\n            remove=0;\n            for(int i=0;i<cur_result.size();i++){\n                if(i>=1&&cur_result.get(i)==cur_result.get(i-1)-32){\n                    cur_result.remove(i);\n                    cur_result.remove(i-1);\n                    remove++;\n                }\n            }\n        }while(remove==0);\n        String final_result=cur_result.toString().replaceAll(\"[,\\\\s\\\\[\\\\]]\", \"\");\n        return final_result;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
